definition: host/official host (e.g. venue for games or a conference)
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
surname Dong

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: His pronouncements were cited with awe by our Chinese hosts.
sentences.chinese: 我們的中國東道主們對他的每句話都奉若神明。

sentences.english: " asked Chile's Mercurio newspaper after Brazil had eliminated the hosts in the semi-final.
sentences.chinese: 智利《水星》報在巴西隊半決賽淘汰東道主後發問。

sentences.english: Li Kaimian who comes from amphitryon institution was the key compere of the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 研討會是由東道主單位的李開綿作爲總的主持人。

sentences.english: I want to thank our host Belgium for the thoughtful arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 感謝東道主比利時爲本屆會議所做的周到安排。

sentences.english: Xabi Alonso, Albert Riera and Alvaro Arbeloa will also be hoping to play against the host nation.
sentences.chinese: 阿隆索列拉阿貝羅阿也有望上場與東道主交手。

sentences.english: Qin added that China is both the host country and the participant of this round of Six-Party Talks.
sentences.chinese: 他說，中方既是本輪六方會談的東道主，也是參與者。

sentences.english: And finally I want to express our deep appreciation to our Chinese hosts.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我希望對我們的中國東道主表示誠摯的謝忱。

sentences.english: As the host, we warmly welcome all the delegations to Beijing again.
sentences.chinese: 作爲東道主，我們熱烈歡迎各方代表團的再次到來。

sentences.english: And finally, I want to express our deep appreciation to our Chinese hosts.
sentences.chinese: 末了，我志願對我們的中國東道主表示誠摯的謝忱。

sentences.english: My reply did not rise to the nobility of my host.
sentences.chinese: 我的答辭沒有滿足東道主的厚望。

sentences.english: If his hosts have a hissy fit , let.
sentences.chinese: 如果他的東道主反對，讓他去吧。

sentences.english: South Africa and Mexico played to a 1-1 draw in the opening game。
sentences.chinese: 東道主南非隊在揭幕戰與墨西哥隊戰成1比1平。

sentences.english: The hosts Angola have been playing Mali in the opening game.
sentences.chinese: 在揭幕戰中，東道主安哥拉隊對戰馬裏隊。

sentences.english: I would like to begin by offering my appreciation to our Chinese hosts for their gracious hospitality.
sentences.chinese: 我首先感謝我們中國東道主的盛情款待。

sentences.english: The team will play against the host South Africans at 10:00 pm Tuesday (Beijing Time).
sentences.chinese: 法國隊將於北京時間今晚22點迎戰東道主南非隊。

sentences.english: The Twenty20 cricket World Cup has opened in England with a surprise defeat for the host team.
sentences.chinese: 板球世界盃在英國開幕，東道主隊意外失敗。

to be determined to win (idiom)
field theory (physics)
Vanuatu, country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean
Uzbek/abbr. for Uzbekistan
to turn defeat into victory (idiom); to turn the tide
lit. to fix the tone with a single hammer blow/fig. to make the final decision

to award a prize
foreign guest/international visitor
arch-enemy/sworn enemy
Milton (name)/John Milton (1608-1674), English republican writer and poet, author of Paradise Lost

loud songs reaches the clouds (idiom); fig. to praise to the skies
exhibition match
